titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties desires and propositions to all his subjects in Scotland declaring his royall intentions and determination to all the Lords of His privie councell concerning this kingdome signed with his royall signet and now published by authority : likewise the resolution of the kingdome of Scotland to all His Majesties subjects in this nation declaring and manifesting their determination concerning the Earl of Essex being glad tydings for England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties desires and propositions to all his subjects in Scotland declaring his royall intentions and determination to all the Lords of His privie councell concerning this kingdome signed with his royall signet and now published by authority : likewise the resolution of the kingdome of Scotland to all His Majesties subjects in this nation declaring and manifesting their determination concerning the Earl of Essex being glad tydings for England.

Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
